thread.title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Double blow for Ghana as Kofi Owusu and Isaac Amoah are ruled out of Ivory Coast clash
thread.title_full: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Double blow for Ghana as Kofi Owusu and Isaac Amoah are ruled out of Ivory Coast clash

title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Double blow for Ghana as Kofi Owusu and Isaac Amoah are ruled out of Ivory Coast clash
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 17 October 2015 23:25 CET 2016 CHAN qualifier: Double blow for Ghana as Kofi Owusu and Isaac Amoah are ruled out of Ivory Coast clash 
Lethal striker Kofi Owusu and Isaac Amoah have been ruled out of Ghanaâ€™s CHAN qualifier against Ivory Coast on Sunday due to injuries, GHANASoccernet.com can exclusively report. 
The duo suffered the setbacks in their final warm up match against Deportivo last week. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
